(A bot the size of Rattrap vs. about 5 Alliance bots all currently headed 
toward the CF's bridge... *graon* Hysteria's gonna die, isn't she?>.< Well, 
I checked with Yan on defenses for the CF, and he said thses were good^_^ 
PLus there are a few other goodies left that I'm holding out on:P I suggest 
all invaders of the CF read the Hysteria portion^_^)

Hysteria/Tav/(Rion coming soon!)

Tavatron fired three energy bursts at Vehement

(kinda sad compared to the rest)

*****

Hysteria yelled somthing about Alliance 'bots and slag sucking exhaust pipes 
as she ducked and covered. Whatever just happened must have been big, 
because when she finally got to her feet Her console was flashing warning 
lights all over the place. The hull had been penetrated, and two enemy bots 
were headed for the bridge, with more on the way:

"Hey, tha--"

Hysteria was going to thank Chordate for the warning, but he seemed to be 
missing. Someone, or something, must have grabbed him. Great. Just great. 
She was alone, in the CF, and about to get her butt whupped by 'bots twice 
her size. Hysteria dove under her console and dug through the debri. She 
pulled out an interface cord and a small portable computer. Well, she didn't 
stand a chance in an all out battle, but maybe there was something else she 
could do.

Hysteria climbed on the main console and pulled herself up into the enarest 
vent. For once her size was an advantage. She could fit, but the other 'bots 
wouldn't get halfway in before they were stuck! She jacked into a panel a 
few feet down the vent and booted the computer:

"Don't these guys ever give up?!"

Hysteria activated several sub programs before she was able to interact with 
the CF's mainframe. She silently typed out several codes:

CF COMP: "Access granted. Bridge lockdown commencing."

With a loud bang and slight shaking large, steel panels slid over the 
computers in the CF. The panels were thick, and nearly impenetrable without 
resulting in serious damage to the computers behind them. All but one 
emergency computer were now well protected. A slight keystroke set the 
computer to self-detonate. It was a last ditch effort, but a necessary one. 
Three more passwords and she was done, for now:

CF COMP: "Auto defences activated."

The remaining defences in the ship opened fire on Unitron and Firestarter. 
Flame throwers that had been laying dormant beneath floor panels were 
suddenly brough to life. The few remaining autoguns sent a barage of armor 
piercing bullets at the invading 'bots.
